de.cocolab.reuse
Class CocktailError

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--java.lang.RuntimeException
                    |
                    +--de.cocolab.reuse.CocktailError
public class CocktailError
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

This exception is thrown if an internal inconsistency or system problem is detected.

This class is a subclass of RuntimeException so need not be caught or quoted in throws clauses. In general these errors terminate the application: the exception need only be caught if a high degree of robustness is required, for example in an applet.

This exception is thrown by:

  • Position.toString()

Version:
$Id: $
See Also:
